column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Give yourself at least 5 hours here - if they have a 2 day pass I would go with this. Staff is friendly and the collection is AMAZING! I have never felt so happy to take a selfie than with some of these works! Talk about role model
column7: etc) I felt more than emotional. They had everything - impressionist and crazy old religious stuff to Native American
column8: Muslim and Modern. Impressive and quirky miniature and paperweight collection. Do your research and come prepared. The cafes inside are expensive so bring a snack or grab a Chicago dog from the stand outside. And don't forget the outdoor gardens as well!!
